Name: Encore's Steaming Adventure!
Description:
Xisha asks you to make him the legendary fireworks. Seems like an easy job... maybe?

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.
QuestDesc:
Xisha asks you to make him the legendary fireworks. Seems like an easy job... maybe?

Unlock a new Companion after completing this quest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's that, Mr. Li? Looks really yummy!

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's called the Plumpcake. A traditional dessert passed down in Jinzhou for thousands of years. Try it, you'll love it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thousands of years... Then there's gotta be cool stories about it. Right, Mr. Li? Do you know any?

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Actually, I do. Let's see...

Dialogues.Speaker: Uncle Li
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This is a story that dates back to the two Sentinels of Huanglong...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Hello, {PlayerName}. Reminds me of my daughter, that little girl... Can't stop talking when it comes to stories and whatnot.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My daughter's gotten herself into fireworks again lately, and she's been bugging me about seeing some.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Luckily for her, her father's quite the handyman. So I went ahead and set up a stall here for the festival.

Options.PlotLineKey: Must be tough being a father...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, tell me about it. But that big smile on her face whenever she sees the fireworks... It really gets me going.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Said she wanted to see the biggest and prettiest fireworks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And so, I've been trying these few days, but she's not impressed with any of my experiments yet. See the failures behind me?

Options.PlotLineKey: I'm sure you can do it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Without a doubt. Tell you what... I think I've managed to get my hands on an ancient fireworks formula just recently.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ingredients seem kinda sketchy, but as the saying goes, "The weirder it is, the cooler it gets."

Options.PlotLineKey: I don't think that's a thing...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mm-hmm... That's why I think this bad boy has the potential! I'm not so sure about this formula though... It seems more suitable for firecrackers than fireworks, according to my experience.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I have some Pompyrite left, but the other materials are hard to come by. Can you help me find them?

Options.PlotLineKey: I can make room in my schedule.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Really? I... Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore suddenly shows up next to you. Was she listening to Mr. Li's story the whole time?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you going on an adventure, {PlayerName}? Encore heard it all! C'mon, let's go together!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It'll be pretty wild wherever {PlayerName}'s going, little one.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No worries! Encore is super strong! Encore will protect {Male=him;Female=her}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uh-huh! What {PlayerName} said!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *giggles* You're welcome, {PlayerName}. That's what friends are for!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: A big adventure to find secret fireworks... Sounds like a great story!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh well, then I'll leave it to you, Encore.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can count on us!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: First, the Flarepowder! Says we need to find it around here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Flarepowder thingie... Never heard of it before. Sounds kinda dangerous.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Charcoal. Hmm... Maybe we can find some around the bonfire.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's go, {PlayerName}!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So this is Flarepowder... Looks like ordinary dirt to me.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You sure we can make fireworks out of it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This must be the Low-frequency Charcoal... Aaand, into Encore's pouch you go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There, that's all of 'em! Let's go find Mr. Xisha!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, that was quick. You got everything?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yup! Mission Complete!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha... Stick around for a bit while I go get these fireworks ready, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After a while, Xisha returns and cautiously hands you the finished fireworks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... these are different from my usual fireworks, and they don't look like firecrackers either.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I might have to ask you guys to go test fire a couple of 'em where it's wide and open and with not many people around, {PlayerName}...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be extra careful, okay?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yay! Time for some fireworks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Let's try it here, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So we just set it on the ground, light it here... and ta-da! It's a fireworks show!

Dialogues.Speaker: Rover
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Something's not right... Encore, throw that thing away!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *cough*... Are you... Are you okay, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: That was... way too big of an explosion.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Encore's alright. Not a scratch. Wasn't scared at all.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But... Are fireworks supposed to be like that?

Options.PlotLineKey: Not really... These are some very powerful firecrackers.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm, I see... I guess his daughter is gonna feel let down this year.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Do you hear something, {PlayerName}?

Options.PlotLineKey: TDs. They must've been drawn by the explosion.
TDs. And quite a few of them too.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey, Encore has an idea. How about we use the rest of these firecrackers on them, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yep, trying new things is a big part of adventuring!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Phew. That's most of the firecrackers. Those TDs didn't even stand a chance!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's head back, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, Encore! How did it go? Did the fireworks go out with a bang?

Options.PlotLineKey: It was a really loud bang...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? What do you mean...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell Xisha what happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Good heavens...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm so sorry, {PlayerName}. Are you alright? Did you guys get hurt?

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, not at all. {PlayerName} had me covered!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *Sigh* I'm glad to hear that. I should get rid of that formula.

Options.PlotLineKey: On second thought. Maybe... It can be put to use elsewhere.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait... you're saying we can use this against the TDs? That might actually work out...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll talk to the guys at Lollo Logistics and see if they'll give it a shot... Thanks for all your help today, you two!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't mention it, Mr. Xisha! Encore got a super cool story out of it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName} and the Woolies vanquished all the monsters in the forest. Despite not finding her flowers, the princess brought peace back to the woods!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Do you understand what she's talking about, {PlayerName}?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whew, I wish I could... Then I may figure out where my daughter's getting all those wackadoo ideas from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ha... My daughter's like that too. Kids these days, you never know what's going on in their heads.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Speaking of my daughter. Thought I finally got it right this time... But it seems I'll have to keep tweaking my formulas. Can't give up just yet.

Dialogues.Speaker: Encore
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can do it, Mr. Xisha! I believe in you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xisha
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You betcha. Thanks, Encore!
